explains: adj. 继续存在的；未死的；依然健在的

sentences.en: The airline has a fighting chance of surviving.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司经过努力可能有幸存的机会。

sentences.en: More and more people are surviving heart attacks.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的人在心脏病发作后存活下来。

sentences.en: He described the difficulties of surviving for four months as a captive.
sentences.cn: 他讲述了沦为阶下囚的4个月中生存的种种不易。
